movie.title: On My Skin: The Last Seven Days of Stefano Cucchi
movie.plot: The incredible true story behind the most controversial Italian court cases in recent years. Stefano Cucchi was arrested for a minor crime but in just one week's time, a family is changed forever.

events.title: Stefano Cucchi is arrested for possession of drugs
Stefano Cucch dies while in custody
